name: Awakening (itch) (Luke Klegraefe)
description:
Embark on a journey to awaken your soul.

Play as the Dummy, a seemingly empty object of no worth. Trapped inside of these paintings, find a way out by traversing through colored pillars - change your paint color to match that of the pillar and you will pass through.

Collect wings in each level to increase your score. Paint palettes will increase your paint meter, while paint rollers will give you a speed boost without using any of your paint!

"Accompanied" by Lilith, a celestial being who doesn't appreciate your mindlessness. Pursue on through 8 different paintings, what is beyond the paintings? Is there a greater being, a greater good? A greater evil? What does it matter, anyways, to a Dummy like yourself?

Between level sequences, engage in conversation with Lilith as she slowly slips into insanity. After all, talking to you is like talking with a brick wall.

Progress saves automatically after each level sequence and is automatically loaded upon opening the game.

_____________________________________________________

Design, Programming, Art - Luke Klegraefe

Music

Wistful Rain – Ghostrifter Official
Far Behind – Silent Partner
Prelude No. 2 – Chris Zabriskie
E Minor Prelude – Chopin
Gymnopedie No. 3 – Wahneta Meixsell
Snowing – Peter Rudenko
C Major Prelude – Bach
Prelude No 11 – Chris Zabriskie
Allemande – Wahneta Meixsell
Gymnopedie No 1 – Satie

_____________________________________________________

Thank you for playing!
